suite.name: Employee Search Negative

test.name: Search: eID Item Does Not Exist

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to given URL.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay in seconds that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks a button identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until `text` appears on current page.

kw.name: Location Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that current URL is exactly `url`.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into the log.

kw.doc: Verifies that `expected` can be found somewhere in the table.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

suite.doc:
A test suite with negative test cases for the search feature in the employee module.
This test has a workflow that is created using keywords in the imported resource file.
